attributes.action: persuade the manufacturers of Stella Artois to brew back at 5.2%
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stella Artois is a lovely drink and was powerful at 5.2% - the effect was like being raped by someone you really fancy. At 5.0% it is simply a shadow of its former glory.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
